org.ff4j.store.kv

Class KeyValueEventRepository<VALUE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.audit.repository.AbstractEventRepository
      • org.ff4j.store.kv.KeyValueEventRepository<VALUE>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - target driver
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventRepository

    public class KeyValueEventRepository<VALUE>
extends AbstractEventRepository
    Common implementation of time-series and audit using J/V stores.
    Author:
    Cedrick LUNVEN (@clunven)
